sections.heading: water in rivers and ravines; right to use
sections.text: The right to the use of running water flowing in any river or stream or down any canyon or ravine may be acquired by appropriation by any person.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 3, ยง 13, p. 850;C.S.1922, ยง 8463;C.S.1929, ยง 46-613;R.S.1943, ยง 4
